name: Aerith_meenow
description:
Other Final Fantasy VII Remake version:

Tifa_meenow

Realistic_Aerith_meenow

About this model:

This is a Lora model about Aerith. I'm not satisfied with this model.you know,It's not easy to training Aerith well.However,There are opportunities for improvement in the future.

About model use:

I have tried several SD models, which can basically be used. Although Aerith belongs to the Western face, the Chilout Mix for the Asian face can still effectively output the results. However, you can also find a better model to output that I haven't found.

<Tips>：It is a good choice to add Lykon's Lora model Final Fantasy VII Make Style (UE4) LoRA weight to 0.1~0.3 when using it, so as to balance the Aerith face and make it more Western-style.

About model issue:

  1. It's better to add skin blemishes or somethings to the negative prompt. I didn't deal with it well. I mixed several pictures of Alice's face stains when the seventh heaven collapsed, and the result was to give Alice random nevus :<

  2. Similarly, if you want to retain Alice's classic attributes, you'd better add all the attributes of clothes. If you want to change clothes or remove clothes, you'd better increase the weight.

By the way, the aerith_pruned version is semi-manufacture,but it is more suitable for changing clothes for realistic people,so provide to use.
